availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Goble G. Burgess (Boyd County, Kentucky, resident.)

body.p: Boyd County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of George R. Burgess and Martha A. Spurlock Burgess. Resident of Lawrence, Kentucky in 1850. Resident of Boyd County, Kentucky in 1860. Listed occupation as artist in 1863. Ran for mayor of Catlettsburg, Kentucky in 1863. Accused of underage drinking in April 1863.

Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lawrence, p. 110A.
